about_snippet.title: About Us
about_snippet.text: Based in Istanbul, Turkey, MarkMorente is a leading men's suit manufacturer specializing in private label and custom production. We offer high-quality suits and trousers for brands and businesses worldwide, with a focus on craftsmanship, flexibility, and global shipping.
